author: jvanzyl
msg: Fixing the primary key generation so that the testbed passes with
the hsqldb profile. The primary key template was being output even if
the table had no primary key which was making the testbed choke on the
operations on the table that has no primary key.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Cleaning up the database property maps ...
Most people probably don't know what these are so here's a little explanation.
When the tdk database mechanism is keyed of a target database type, for each
type there is a file in this directory. Ant loads one of these files and
uses the values for the target database to create the database specific
properties in the generated build.properties file for a project.
Right now we have three values in here:
-> JDBC driver class
database.driver = org.foo.bar.Driver
-> URL required for normal operations
database.url = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/${database.name}
-> URL required when using SQL directly to create databases
database.creation.url = jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mysql
